name: O (drearyweary)
description:
This could be the shortest (or longest) Sunday in Phoebe Su's life...

O is an interactive webcomic originally released in 2019. Click or touch the panels to move the story forward.

Follow post-graduate student Phoebe Su as she experiences something odd happening to an otherwise ordinary Sunday.

Discover the mysteries of O the more times you continue. Can you guide Phoebe to one of four possible endings?

Music by Charlie Lim.

* Note: This webcomic uses the browser's cache to save your progress. Please enable third party cookies (and cross site tracking in Safari) for it to work properly.

** Note to mobile users: This requires a 50mb download. Please use WiFi to save data.
